verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/Baoqing_Chaoyang_Surface_Mine. The Baoqing Chaoyang Surface Coal Mine is a permitted coal mine located in Chaoyang Town, Baoqing, Shuangyashan, Heilongjiang Province

web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Guoneng Baoqing Coal Electricity Chemical Company, which is a subsidiary of China Energy.
